commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Major cleanup of lua-compiler & lua-cross-compiler scripts.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix crash when liblua_main.bc was compiled with debug info enabled.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix coroutine support for ARM Thumb mode.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Add some sane CROSS_COMPILE defaults.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix bug with ARM EABI COCO support.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Remove FORCE_ALIGNMENT hack (No longer needed yea!).

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Cleanup Cross-compile support.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Remove debug print.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Add ARM EABI support to LuaCOCO.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Correct offset to SP register on ARM EAPI.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: ucontext is not implemented on some arm systems (all EABI?)

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Quiet warning about redefinition of COCO_MAIN_PARAM

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Update LuaCoco patch to 1.1.7

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix issue with lua-cross-compiler script.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Make Clang happy.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Cleanup BC_CFLAGS code.  Remove invalid flags from lua-cross-compiler script.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Add missing '-c' flag to BC_CFLAGS for cross-compile.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Possible fix for cross-compile.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Don't run JIT compiler from coroutine.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Enable LUA_COMPAT_MOD & LUA_COMPAT_GFIND.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Grow opcode temp. arrays when compiling large functions.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix "struct.constant_num_type" type.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Correctly cleanup temp. arrays.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Fix clang flag for cross-compile.

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Remove old broken Makefiles.

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Several headers were (re)moved (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Anonymous structs have to be retrieved using getAnon instead of get (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Strings have to be retrieved using ConstantDataArray::getString instead of ConstantArray::get (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: getGetElementPtr takes the arguments as an ArrayRef instead of an pointer/length pair (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Linker::LinkModules needs to know whether to preserve the source (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: The type system in LLVM 3.0 changed: Named structs are allowed and recursive structs have to be created differently

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Builder.CreateCall takes the arguments as an ArrayRef instead of an iterator begin/end pair (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Builder.CreatePHI requires the number of branches as an argument (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: The Tail Duplication Pass was removed in LLVM r138841 (LLVM 3.0)

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Type pointers are no longer const anymore in LLVM 3.0

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Global target specific flags moved to TargetOptions class in LLVM 3.1

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Amend b4ff1b791d9e: Inform clang about additional include directories and so it finds the generated llvm_lua_config.h

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Remove empty header files

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Make LLVM_LUA_VERSION and LLVM_LUA_COPYRIGHT configurable via cmake

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Add hgignore

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Add script to split HG patch sets.

commits.author: Dennis Schridde
commits.message: Allow to compile static/dynamic and nojit libraries independently

commits.author: Robert G. Jakabosky
commits.message: Move .svnignore to .gitignore

commits.message: Update to LLVM 2.7 API.

commits.message: Add note about coroutine C-Stack alignment issue. Added LINK_FLAGS hack, to fix linker erros on some linux systems.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixed memory leak, tailcalls, memlimit. Release LLVM Function objects when Lua Proto's are garbage collected. Fixed a few of tailcall bugs. Fixed a bug with the memlimit code. Improved command line option parsing. Added hack for iPhone support.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Add testcase: tailcall from varg function.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixed tailcall inside varg function bug.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixed memory leaks and a memory access error.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Improved cross-compiling support.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Made jit_proto & constant_type structures more portable. Added correct amount of padding for target architecture.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Adding support for all native backends to llvm-luac.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Added example 'embed_jit.c' & 'embed_jit.cpp' files.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixed bug with native target initialization.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Add better support for -arch flag

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Removed debug messages.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Added support for compiling static lua-modules.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Removed unneeded "-rdynamic -Wl,-E" from 'lua-compiler' script.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Ported code to LLVM 2.6 API. Applied patches for Lua 5.1.4: 3. Wrong code generation for some particular boolean expressions 4. luaV_settable may invalidate a reference to a table and try to reuse it. 5. debug.getfenv does not check whether it has an argument.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixing MinGW support.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Add support for compiling shared library liblua-llvm.so

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Fixed bug with lua-compiler. Added '-c++' option for static compiling Lua code with C++ exception support.

commits.author: bobby@neoawareness.com
commits.message: Add C++ exception support.  llvm-lua is now thread-safe.
